div.div: With the recent management shake-up, it's become clear that Apple is now Tim Cook's company to make.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T39wgL&via=Digg&text=Apple Shake-Up Signals Cook Era

div.a: Are Disney And George Lucas Hiding Something?

div.div: There are only a few reasons why, if you're Disney, you announce that you're buying George Lucas's film studio for $4 billion today, in the middle of an impenetrable news cycle surrounding a major natural disaster.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W3Wm92&via=Digg&text=Are Disney And George Lucas Hiding Something?

div.div: BIKE VS CAR RARELY ENDS SO WELL

div.a: Lone Cyclist Thwarts Law-Breaking KGB Dude

div.div: Here’s an awesome display of vigilante justice delivered for all to see in the streets of Moscow and the internets of Russia.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T2Q7fU&via=Digg&text=Lone Cyclist Thwarts Law-Breaking KGB Dude

div.a: Almost Every Website On The Planet Could Be In Legal Jeopardy Now, Thanks To Zappos

div.div: Zappos just lost a big court battle that could have ramifications for pretty much every website.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W4e8Je&via=Digg&text=Almost Every Website On The Planet Could Be In Legal Jeopardy Now, Thanks To Zappos

div.div: Twelve terrifying tales from the nuclear crypt.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RrFIfi&via=Digg&text=12 Nightmarish Stories About Nuclear War

div.a: Meet The FDNY's One-Woman Twitter Response Team

div.div: As Storm Sandy barreled down on the Northeast on Monday, a one-woman response team at the Fire Department of New York monitored Twitter through the night to help people in need.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RmuUvC&via=Digg&text=Meet The FDNY's One-Woman Twitter Response Team

div.a: 'Inappropriate' Greeting Cards Made With Venn Diagrams

div.div: Made with venn diagrams, pie charts and bar graphs, the tongue-in-cheek ‘Greetings from Nowhere’ greeting cards are inappropriately tell of the truth in a humorous and honest way.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Rqqgjz&via=Digg&text='Inappropriate' Greeting Cards Made With Venn Diagrams

div.div: Apocalyptic weather situations do bring out the wacky in some, like these people who just had to go out and experience Hurricane Sandy for themselves. Instead of, you know, staying home and hoping the lights stayed on and streets stayed dry.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TsxPXP&via=Digg&text=Idiots In The Storm

div.div: Developing a penchant for a life of luxury while many in their country starve and struggle is just one of the aspects that can be consistent through a variety of despots.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SsVckf&via=Digg&text=Despots And Their Favorite Drinks

div.a: Sea Level Rise During Hurricane Sandy Will Be Typical For NYC By 2200

div.div: With climate change, a 9-foot water level rise isn't that far off.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YjQMNe&via=Digg&text=Sea Level Rise During Hurricane Sandy Will Be Typical For NYC By 2200

div.div: Montreal based artist Shelley Miller challenges the rough and gritty world of graffiti with her cake icing graffiti. Instead of the usual tags and throw ups Miller brings to the streets a delicate floral touch more likely to be found on triple decker wedding cake from the victorian era.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PF8N8N&via=Digg&text=Cake Icing Graffiti

div.a: Sexy Breast Cancer Campaigns Anger Many Patients

div.div: Campaigns like Feel Your Boobies and Save the Ta-Tas demean women and trivialize the disease, critics say.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YjZuuP&via=Digg&text=Sexy Breast Cancer Campaigns Anger Many Patients

div.a: The Moment The Lights Went Out In New York

div.div: This is what it looks like when the lights go out as downtown New York City floods.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Rkxrqe&via=Digg&text=The Moment The Lights Went Out In New York

div.a: Meet The Twitter Villain Of Hurricane Sandy

div.div: During the storm last night, user @comfortablysmug was the source of a load of frightening but false information about conditions in New York City that spread wildly on Twitter and onto news broadcasts before ConEd, the MTA, and Wall Street sources had to take time out of the crisis situation to refute them.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VBqkeP&via=Digg&text=Meet The Twitter Villain Of Hurricane Sandy

div.a: Conan Takes On The iPad Mini

div.div: Best part? The slogan at the end, which Cupertino might want to consider officially adopting.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PDGqI1&via=Digg&text=Conan Takes On The iPad Mini

div.a: Disney Buys LucasFilm For $4.05 Billion, Announces Episode 7

div.div: Disney is paying $4.05 billion to buy Lucasfilm Ltd., the production company behind “Star Wars,” from its chairman and founder, George Lucas. It’s also making a seventh movie in the “Star Wars” series.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SaJmaO&via=Digg&text=Disney Buys LucasFilm For $4.05 Billion, Announces Episode 7

div.a: The Most Surreal Images Of Hurricane Sandy

div.div: Collected here are images of Sandy's aftermath, many from New York City, which suffered widespread blackouts and a record-setting high tide early this morning.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VB1gVl&via=Digg&text=The Most Surreal Images Of Hurricane Sandy

div.a: Jimmy Fallon Opens Show Outside, Does Monologue Without An Audience

div.div: In the midst of Hurricane Sandy, Jimmy opens the show from the streets of NYC, then performs his monologue for an empty audience.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SbovVL&via=Digg&text=Jimmy Fallon Opens Show Outside, Does Monologue Without An Audience

div.div: Microsoft's mobile platform gets hardware muscle and another lease on life.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tqy45O&via=Digg&text=Is Windows Phone 8 A Contender?

div.a: The Psychology Of Riding Out The Storm

div.div: Why do some people insist on staying in the path of the storm long after others have been evacuated, the roads have closed or flooded and rescue is difficult or impossible?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T1DWjy&via=Digg&text=The Psychology Of Riding Out The Storm

div.a: Katrina FEMA Director Criticizes Obama For Responding To Sandy Too Quickly

div.div: Former FEMA Director Michael Brown offered criticism of President Obama’s early responses to Hurricane Sandy yesterday, including a dig at the administration’s response to last month’s attack in Libya.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SsjJpw&via=Digg&text=Katrina FEMA Director Criticizes Obama For Responding To Sandy Too Quickly

div.a: The Government Secretly Spied On You? Prove It!

div.div: On Monday, as Hurricane Sandy shut down most of the rest of the federal government, the black-robed justices of the Supreme Court gathered to hear a case that embodies the post-9/11 paradox: Can the government violate your rights as long as it does so in secret?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SZe3Rd&via=Digg&text=The Government Secretly Spied On You? Prove It!

div.div: ONE WITH THE LEAST STDs WINS
All 6 Bond actors duke it out in a battle to the death. How does your favorite 007 fare?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PDr1HT&via=Digg&text=James Bond Movie Deathmatch

div.a: Your Employee Is An Online Celebrity. Now What Do You Do?

div.div: A growing number of professionals are using social media to build a personal, public identity—a brand of their own—based on their work.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Q0lmv8&via=Digg&text=Your Employee Is An Online Celebrity. Now What Do You Do?

div.a: Why Nobody Is Laughing At Marijuana Reformers Anymore

div.div: Election 2012, the Marijuana Majority project, and the rapidly changing politics of drug prohibition.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XKoDzJ&via=Digg&text=Why Nobody Is Laughing At Marijuana Reformers Anymore

div.a: Five Supervillain Weapons Science Has Already Invented

div.div: One of the problems of writing comics is that technology inevitably marches onward. What seems incredible and bizarre now is stuff you can get at Target in a few years. And, in fact, a lot of supposedly advanced technology? Yeah. It's already been built. In fact some of it you can build, right now, in your garage, or just buy it

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T0jcII&via=Digg&text=Five Supervillain Weapons Science Has Already Invented

div.a: The Story Behind The Famous FedEx Logo, And Why It Works

div.div: It isn't what's there; it's what's not there argues Matthew May in "The Laws of Subtraction."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UwzGg0&via=Digg&text=The Story Behind The Famous FedEx Logo, And Why It Works

div.a: Gmail Launches Overhaul That Will Save You Time

div.div: Today, Google has introduced a new compose email view and reply experience for Gmail and it should save you a bit of time.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Pjjj4d&via=Digg&text=Gmail Launches Overhaul That Will Save You Time

div.div: Do you work for a living? Have you seen the recent presidential polls? Has your life not gone entirely as you had planned? Or, are you holed up in your apartment as a category-twelve murder storm trawls its way toward you? If you answered yes to any or all of these questions, I'd like to introduce you to a little drink that will make you feel soothed and mellow and lull you through any anxiety-related sleeping problems.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TQKAxm&via=Digg&text=How To Make Bear Milk

div.a: Obama And Romney Turn To Instagram In Battle Of White House Photo Worthiness

div.div: When did the Romney team learn about Instagram? How long till they also hear about "autofocus"? How many windbreakers does Paul Ryan own? And who does John Sununu hate more: Barack Obama or Lena Dunham?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Q4w3wK&via=Digg&text=Obama And Romney Turn To Instagram In Battle Of White House Photo Worthiness

div.div: Vampire movies and TV shows are the rage nowadays—perhaps because their heroes are attractive, tormented, and misunderstood, which is how many young viewers see themselves. But the original Dracula was not quite so attractive. In fact, he was the very model of a thug.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RlSZmi&via=Digg&text=Dracula Was The Original Thug
